name: youtube-automation
description: YouTube Shorts automation system that creates, uploads, and analyzes videos with GitHub API integration for enhanced Supabase and Gemini collaboration

scripts.start: N8N_HOST=0.0.0.0 N8N_PORT=$PORT N8N_BASIC_AUTH_ACTIVE=true N8N_SECURE_COOKIE=false N8N_ENFORCE_SETTINGS_FILE_PERMISSIONS=false N8N_PERSONALIZATION_ENABLED=false n8n start
scripts.deploy: echo 'Deploy to hosting platform: npm install && n8n import:credentials --secrets .env && n8n'
scripts.deploy:railway: echo 'Preparing for Railway deployment' && npm install && npx n8n import:credentials --input=credentials.json 2>/dev/null || echo 'Credentials import skipped' && n8n
scripts.github:backup: git add . && git commit -m "Backup: System configuration" && git push origin main
scripts.github:version: echo Creating new version tag && git tag -a v$(date '+%Y.%m.%d') -m "Auto-generated release" && git push origin v$(date '+%Y.%m.%d')
scripts.github:sync-services: echo 'Syncing with Supabase and Gemini services via GitHub API'
